data.comment: Mouscron kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Fabrice Olinga (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 40, Saad Agouzoul (Mouscron) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jean Onana is booked for the away team.
The first half has been concluded at Den Dreef Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Heverlee - Oud-Heverlee with the kick-off.
Goal! Pierre-Yves Ngawa heads Oud-Heverlee into a 1-0 lead.
The away team replace Serge Tabekou with Nuno Da Costa.
In the minute 69, Kristiyan Malinov is replacing Mathieu Maertens for Oud-Heverlee at Den Dreef Stadium.
Marc Brys is making the team's second substitution at Den Dreef Stadium with Daan Vekemans replacing Moussa Al-Taamari.
Mouscron make their second substitution with Imad Faraj replacing Fabrice Olinga.
In the minute 77, Marko Bakic (Mouscron) has received a first yellow card.
Charles-Andreas Brym is on a sub for Harlem Gnohere for Mouscron.
Great finish from Thomas Henry to give Oud-Heverlee a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 87, Charles-Andreas Brym is booked for the away team.
The home team have replaced Kamal Sowah with Olivier Myny. This is the third substitution made today by Marc Brys.
Wesley Alen blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
